Uses of Package
com.terremark

Packages that use com.terremark
com.terremark Provides the classes necessary for interfacing with the Terremark API. 
 

Classes in com.terremark used by com.terremark
ComputePoolHandler
          Provides API calls for top level objects with in an compute pool: Resource Template Virtual machine Detached disk Operating system family
EnvironmentHandler
          Provides API calls for objects with in an environment: Compute pool Network summary Physical device Retry operation Task Layout Row Group
NetworkHandler
          Provides API calls for top level objects with in an network: Network Trusted network group Public IP Firewall rule Firewall log IP address Network host Internet services Backup Internet services Monitor Node service RNAT
OrganizationHandler
          Provides API calls for top level objects with in an organization: Organization Environment Tag Location Catalog Bandwidth Alert SSH key Support ticket Administrative organization User Contact API key Audit log Role Business operation
TerremarkClient
          Terremark client interface.
